document_data.name: ''The Kingdom of Lions''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Kingdom of Lions''''' was an ancient [[Zakhara|Zakharan]] text written in [[Old Anwahran]].
document_data.Description: The cover of the tome was decorated with the symbol of Anwahran kingshipâ€“a golden [[lion]] displayed on a [[malachite]] green field. The book was magically warded to preserve it over the centuries.
document_data.History:
Written by [[Azaltin ibn Issad]], the ''Kingdom of Lions'' chronicled the history of [[Al-Anwahr]] up to the revolution led by Azaltin's brother [[Amakim ibn Issad|Amakim]].

Fearing the tome's discovery by a vizer named [[Zeenab]], Azaltin carefully hid the tome.
